Invalid Contract Function.Description: If the target contract does not have the function giveBlockReward, the call will fail silently due to the unchecked low-level call.

Overflow in Loop Parameter.Description: Passing a very large value to `number` can lead to high gas usage or running out of gas during execution.

Unchecked Call Vulnerability.Description: The contract performs unchecked low-level calls, leading to potential silent failures or other unexpected behavior.

Recovery Mechanisms.None: No explicit mechanisms are implemented to handle failures or recover from unintended behavior.
